project_description: An automated trading bot that detects signals from a Telegram channel and executes trades on Bybit Futures.
bot_functionality: This bot parses designated Telegram messages, executes and manages orders in real-time via the Bybit API, and sends all results to a log channel.
message_detection_description: Monitors trading signal messages from a specified channel.
flexible_parsing_description: Uses regular expressions to extract Symbol, Entry Price, Leverage, Stop Loss, and Take Profit from various signal formats.
auto_order_execution_description: Automatically executes Market / Limit orders based on the extracted information.
auto_qty_calculation_description: Automatically calculates the order quantity based on account balance and the fund percentage included in the signal.
order_modification_cancellation_descript: When a signal message is edited, it cancels the existing order and places a new one.
"Cancel" command can instantly cancel open orders.
realtime_notifications_description: Sends fill/fail results to a Telegram log channel.
duplicate_order_prevention_description: Automatically filters out duplicate trades for the same symbol.
env_file_required: This project requires a .env file to run.
env_file_creation: Create a .env file in the project root and enter the following values:
bat_run_description: Set the project/virtual environment path in the file before running.
caution_description_1: This project is for educational and research purposes only.
caution_description_2: If you use it for live trading, be sure to fully test it in a testnet environment.
caution_description_3: Cryptocurrency trading involves high risk, and all responsibility rests with the user.
